<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Disruptive Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=401) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
<trait label="Stance" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=152" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 150 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

The slightest distraction can provoke your wrath, and you're prepared to foil enemies' actions. As long as you are in this stance, you can use [Attack of Opportunity](/Actions.aspx?ID=8) when a creature within your reach uses a [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) action, in addition to [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104) and [move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114) actions. Furthermore, you [disrupt](/Rules.aspx?ID=394) a triggering concentrate or manipulate action if your Strike hits (not only if it's a critical hit).
name: Disruptive Stance
